requiredEquipmentExplanation: The metadata for this workout video suggests that no equipment is needed. The title and description emphasize a cardio workout focused on losing belly fat at home, which aligns with bodyweight exercises. The channel description explicitly states that the channel provides body weight workouts with no equipment necessary, reinforcing that equipment is not required for this particular routine. Additionally, the top comments include detailed breakdowns of the workout routine, listing exercises such as side bends, jumping jacks, and mountain climbers, all of which are typically performed without equipment. Therefore, it appears that this workout is designed to be a bodyweight-only routine suitable for at-home performance without the need for any specific fitness equipment.
